Name: Shri Jagdeep Dhankhar
SchoolEducation: Educated at Government Primary School, Village Kithana; Government Middle School, Ghardhana and Chittorgarh Sainik School. Passed the Chittorgarh Sainik School Entrance Examination for admission to Class 5 on full merit scholarship, 1962. Passed the Indian School Certificate Examination recognized by the Cambridge University.
CollegeEducation: Graduated from Maharajas’ college, Jaipur, affiliated to the University of Rajasthan; LL.B. from the University of Rajasthan, 1978-1979.
PermanentAddress: Village & P.O. Kithana, District Jhunjhunu, Rajasthan
PresentAddress: Vice-President’s House, 6, Maulana Azad Road, New Delhi-110011

PositionsHeld.Position: Chairman, Committee on Absence of Members from the Sittings of the House
Union Deputy Minister for Parliamentary Affairs
Vice-President of India and ex officio Chairman, Rajya Sabha

Publications: Has contributed articles extensively on legal issues in newspapers and periodicals
AssociationsAndOtherInterests: Life Member, Indian Law Institute, New Delhi
Elected Member of the Rajasthan Bar Council, 1988

OtherInformation.Profession: Was enrolled with the Bar Council of Rajasthan as an Advocate since November 1979. Designated as Senior Advocate by the High Court of Judicature for Rajasthan since March 1990; had been practicing primarily in the Supreme court and his focus area of litigation have been in the field of steel, coal, mining and international commercial arbitration, amongst others; has appeared in various high courts in the country and was the senior-most designated Senior Advocate of the state till assuming the Office of the Governor of West Bengal on 30 July 2019.
TheVicePresidentAsChancellorOrVisitorOfU: Visitor (ex officio), Makhanlal Chaturvedi Rashtriya Patrakarita Vishwavidhyalaya, Bhopal
TheVicePresidentAsPresidentOrChairmanOfT: President (ex officio) of The Indian Institute of Public Administration (IIPA), Delhi
President (ex officio) of The Indian Council of World Affairs (ICWA), Delhi
Chairman of the Selection Committee of Prasar Bharti Board for selection of the Members of the Board
Chairman of the Committee for selection of Chairman of The Press Council of India
TheVicePresidentAsChairmanOfJuriesOrSele: Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Awards (Jury Constituted by Ministry of Overseas Indian Affairs)
International Gandhi Award for Leprosy (Jury Constituted by Gandhi Memorial Leprosy Foundation- Wardha Under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare)
National Communal Harmony Award (Jury Constituted by the Ministry of Home Affairs)
Dr. Ambedkar International Award for Social Change (Jury Constituted by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment)
Jawaharlal Nehru Award for International Understanding (Jury Constituted by the Ministry of External Affairs)
